section.name: Event Monitoring
section.p: Internal events within the Transit system are forwarded to a set of event routers, each dealing with a particular Transit sub-system. Routers forward events to registered monitors.

tr.td: Handles events related to resource requests, modification of the local cache, and download failures.
Handles events dealing with the openning and closing of connections.
Handles events dealing with network activitiy including progressive download activitiy and download completion.
Handles events dealing with plugin requests, plugin class establishment, constructor discovery, plugin instantiation, classloader creation, and plugin error reporting.
